definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be vast, mighty, numerous (NH Nithp. contend strenuously, and in deriv.; Ph. in [[עחמת]] mighty deeds, [[עחמם]] bones; Ar. 9az.uma be great  in bone, or anything, 9az.umun, bones; Eth. 9ad.m: id.; Aram. [[עִטְמָא]], 9at.mo0 thigh):—
be mighty, Ge 26:16 (J; c. [[מִן]] comp.), Da 8:8, Da 8:24, Da 11:23.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: make strong, Impf. 3 ms: sf. [[וַיַּעֲחִימֵחוּ]] Ps 105:24 + [[מִן]] comp.
